General.Name: Pepco Group B.V.
General.Description: Pepco Group N.V. operates as a discount variety retailer in the United Kingdom, Poland, and rest of Europe. The company offers apparel comprising children wear; homeware-led general merchandise, including toys, home decors, and seasonal products; and FMCG. It also offers food and drink, health and beauty, household, gardening, DIY, pet, stationery, books, and DVDs. The company operates stores under the Pepco, Poundland, and Dealz brands. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is based in London, the United Kingdom. Pepco Group N.V. operates as a subsidiary of Pepco Holdco Limited.
General.Address: Capital House, London, United Kingdom, NW1 5DH
